typeparam.span: 在 集合中提供的值型別。

summary.span: 針對 集合中所提供的每個值執行一次活動動作。

span.span: Executes an activity action once for each value provided in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類似的關鍵字`foreach`但實作為活動，而非語言陳述式。 is similar to the keyword `foreach` but is implemented as an activity rather than a language statement. 請注意，不同於`foreach`在 C# 中，活動會使用，而非。Note that unlike `foreach` in C#, the activity uses , rather than . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 活動。The following code sample demonstrates creating a activity. 這個範例取自[DynamicActivity 建立](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/dynamicactivity-creation.md)範例。This example is from the [DynamicActivity Creation](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/dynamicactivity-creation.md) sample.
